resources.string: You persuaded the Seedy Sapling to be your informant for %d Vine Cred.
You need at least %d Vine Cred to make this sapling your informant.
You sleuthed %d Secrets from the Sapling.
This Seedy Sapling is stumped for now. Come back later.
You built a Shady Grove. This is the first headquarters for your sappy sleuthing. Over time, you can upgrade it to support your arborous spy agency.
Walk or jog around the neighborhood to get Vine Cred.
We need some Vine Cred before we can set up our first headquarters.
You have enough Vine Cred for your first headquarters, the Shady Grove. Choose a central location to build your headquarters and double-click to build it.
Now that we\'ve grown our Shady Grove, let\'s go investigate the area.
We can use %d Vine Cred to make this Sapling our informant. Double-click near the Sapling to turn it to your side.
Seedy Sapling informants sleuth out Secrets over time. To collect the Secrets, come back after some time and single-click near the Saplings.
You\'ve completed the tutorial, but there is a lot more to discover - get out there and Sap some Secrets!
